summary: The diff implements all requested requirements for manual revision completion workflow with missed revision indicators. Backend adds isReviewed field to RevisionSchedule, frontend adds 'Mark as Reviewed' buttons in TodayView and SubTopicScheduleView, and CalendarView shows red indicators for missed revisions. All acceptance criteria appear to be covered with proper cache invalidation and UI updates.

hallucinated_features.description: Migration module (backend/migration.mo) for data migration with isReviewed field
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested data migration logic or backward compatibility handling for existing revision schedules

hallucinated_features.description: Reschedule revision to next day functionality
hallucinated_features.reason: The SubTopicScheduleView includes a 'Redo Tomorrow' button and useRescheduleRevisionToNextDay hook, but no requirement requested the ability to reschedule revisions to the next day
